Age_of_Chaos.name: Age of Chaos
Age_of_Chaos.known_for: No gods, no magic, tribal survival.
Age_of_Chaos.summary: The Age of Chaos followed the God Wars, with the Pact of Olympus preventing divine influence. Magic disappeared, civilizations crumbled, and mortals struggled to survive.
major_events: Agricultural and industrial revolutions sparked at the end
Age_of_Chaos.legacy: Marked by technological evolution and the beginning of mortal self-reliance.

Age_of_Creation.name: Age of Creation
Age_of_Creation.known_for: Technological advancement and eventual nuclear apocalypse.
Age_of_Creation.summary: Mortals thrived through technological means. Peace was nearly achieved until escalating conflict led to nuclear war.
Age_of_Creation.legacy: Ended in nuclear devastation, prompting divine return in the next age.

Age_of_Division.name: Age of Division
Age_of_Division.summary: Magic weakened; species and nations clashed in numerous conflicts. Orcs rebelled against humans in Athenia.
Age_of_Division.legacy: Instability gave way to eventual cooperation and trade.

Age_of_Magic.name: Age of Magic
Age_of_Magic.known_for: Magic resurgence, magical wars, planar instability.
Age_of_Magic.summary: Planar rifts allowed magic and chaos to flood in. Magic users rose to power but lacked discipline, sparking conflicts over magical resources.
major_events: Rise of magic and magical warfare
Age_of_Magic.legacy: Transitioned world from chaotic magical wars to structured societies with declining magic.

Age_of_Unity.name: Age of Unity
Age_of_Unity.known_for: Trade, diplomacy, magical and technological growth.
Age_of_Unity.summary: Marked by peace and cooperation. Spellcraft and tech advanced. Orcs remained isolationist.
major_events: Phoenix War initiated by Serinvlad Blackiron
Age_of_Unity.legacy: Ended in mass genocide and collapse of civilization.

Modern_Age.name: Modern Age
Modern_Age.summary: After the Phoenix War and mass destruction, civilization is struggling to recover amidst ruined cities and lingering threats.
Modern_Age.legacy: Unfinished; the world is still healing and rebuilding.

Period_of_Rebirth.name: Period of Rebirth
Period_of_Rebirth.known_for: Return of gods, survival struggle, rebirth of civilization.
Period_of_Rebirth.summary: Following nuclear war, the gods returned to aid mortals, helping to restore the world. Athenia was founded, and Set was murdered by Athena.
Period_of_Rebirth.legacy: Sparked a new age of magic and divine restraint.

The_Forgotten_Age.name: The Forgotten Age
The_Forgotten_Age.known_for: Infighting among the gods after usurping Death; massive devastation across planes.
The_Forgotten_Age.summary: The God Wars began when Death, the old Godking, was overthrown and put into eternal sleep by his council, who then turned on each other. The gods fought across the astral and mortal planes, causing severe and lasting damage to the world.
major_events: Widespread destruction across mortal and astral planes
The_Forgotten_Age.legacy: Left mortal realm scarred; ended with Pact of Olympus which prohibited gods from interfering in the mortal realm.

The_God_Wars.name: The God Wars
The_God_Wars.known_for: Infighting among the gods after usurping Death; massive devastation across planes.
The_God_Wars.summary: The God Wars began when Death, the old Godking, was overthrown and put into eternal sleep by his council, who then turned on each other. The gods fought across the astral and mortal planes, causing severe and lasting damage to the world.
major_events: Widespread destruction across mortal and astral planes
The_God_Wars.legacy: Left mortal realm scarred; ended with Pact of Olympus which prohibited gods from interfering in the mortal realm.
